ISIS-Fish outputs simulations formatting

Source: R/outputs_simulations_settings.R
outputs_simulations_settings.Rd

Function for ISIS-Fish outputs simulations formatting and manipulation.

Usage

outputs_simulations_settings(directory_path)

Arguments

directory_path

Mandatory. Class character expected. Directory path of the ISIS-Fish outputs simulations.

Value

The function returns a list with a length in relation to the number of simulation directory provided. Each element of the list has information about metadata and data (original and improved) associated with the simulation.

Examples

#replace the value of directory_path by a correct path
try(outputs_simulations_settings(directory_path = "my/path/to/simulations/directory"))
#> Error in outputs_simulations_settings(directory_path = "my/path/to/simulations/directory") : 
#>   2026-01-07 09:16:39 - Error, no input simulation available in the directory path.
